result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.
result.ga: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.orig: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.html: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.
result.ponchtml: Beag an baol go n-aimseoiḋ sí rud ar biṫ ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: We need to take a chance and try it.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.orig: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.html: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid dul sa seans agus triail a ḃaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.

result.eng: Although we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ga: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.orig: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.html: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ponchtml: Cé naċ ḃfuil seans againn riṫfiḋ muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.

result.eng: I didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ga: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.orig: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.html: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháilI didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ seans agam foġlaim a ḟáilI didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.eng: He doesn't have a chance in the race.
result.html: Níl seans aige sa rásaHe doesn't have a chance in the race.
result.ponchtml: Níl seans aige sa rásaHe doesn't have a chance in the race.

result.html: Tá seans maith agatYou have a good chance.
result.ponchtml: Tá seans maiṫ agatYou have a good chance.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
